TEXT.TITLE: INTERNATIONAL PAGURIAN HAS FIVE MONTH PROFIT
TEXT.BODY: <International Pagurian Corp Ltd> said it had net profit of 3.3 mln dlrs or three cts a share for the period August 15 to December 31, 1986, based on 55.2 mln shares outstanding. Revenues for the full year ended December 31, 1986 were 5.5 mln dlrs and net assets at year end were 317.5 mln dlrs. The company did not disclose earnings for the 1986 period before August 15 or prior year results. A company spokesman said prior results were not comparable due to its August 15 issue of 30 mln common shares. Reuter
